protocol.name: P-GSE21076-2
protocol.text: Seeds from A. thaliana ecotype Wassilewskija (WS) were sown on a soil/sand mixture, stratified for 3 days at 4 °C, and then grown under a 12 h photoperiod in a growth chamber at 20 °C.

protocol.name: P-GSE21076-3
protocol.text: In two independent experiments, cotyledons from the ecotype Wassilewskija (WS) were inoculated with water, or with H. arabidopsidis to establish a compatible interaction. Total RNA was extracted using the NucleoSpin Plant RNA preparation kit according to the manufacturer’s instructions (Macherey-Nagel, Hoerd, France). Equal amounts of RNA extracted at 8 h and 24 h after inoculation were mixed to produce the “early” interaction samples. Equal amounts of RNA from cotyledons at 4 d and 6 d after inoculation were mixed to produce the “late” interaction samples.

protocol.name: P-GSE21076-4
protocol.text: Hybridized probes were labeled with streptavidin-phycoerythrin conjugate and anti streptavidine antibody,

protocol.name: P-GSE21076-5
protocol.text: RNA samples from the “early” and “late” compatible interaction, and from the water-treated control (5 µg each) were submitted to hybridizations on Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChips

protocol.name: P-GSE21076-8
protocol.text: For infection, 10-day-old plants were spray-inoculated to saturation with a spore suspension of 40,000 spores/ml (strain  Emwa1)
